## PR Checklist

- [ ] Master Merged
- [ ] Build Successfull
- [ ] Playwright Added
- [ ] Playwright Successfull


## PR Type

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug Fix
- [ ] CSS Only
- [ ] Refactoring Only

## Peer Testing Checklist

- [ ] Feature Tested
- [ ] Bug Fix Tested
- [ ] Api calls monitored in network
- [ ] Performance Tested
- [ ] Peer Testing done by [Name]
